Title: Wonder Boys
Actors: Michael Douglas, Tobey Maguire, Frances McDormand, Robert Downey Jr.
Plot: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.
Production: Marubeni Corporation, Curtis Hanson Productions, Mutual Film Company, Scott Rudin Productions, MFF, Paramount Pictures, BBC
